analysis.key_quote: I believe the reclassification of the career civil service employees who participate in the development of funding announcements and oversee the review of grant applications as Schedule F would politicize the NIH.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses concern that the proposed rule would politicize the National Institutes of Health (NIH), which indicates opposition to the rule. It emphasizes the importance of maintaining scientific integrity and public trust in federally funded research.
